mapper.select: SELECT screenroom_key screenroomKey , theater_key theaterKey , screenroom_name screenroomName , seat_count seatCount , createdate FROM screenroom ORDER BY screenroom_name DESC
SELECT screenroom_key screenroomKey , theater_key theaterKey , screenroom_name screenroomName , seat_count seatCount , createdate FROM screenroom WHERE screenroom_key = #{screenroomKey}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM screenroom sc LEFT JOIN seat se ON sc.screenroom_key = se.screenroom_key LEFT JOIN screening_schedule ss ON sc.screenroom_key = ss.screenroom_key WHERE sc.screenroom_key = #{screenroomKey}
